Name: Northern Region
Description: The Northern Region of Malta encompasses the island s  scenic coastal areas, including beaches and resorts, and is known for its tourism and natural beauty.

Name: Southern Region
Description: The Southern Region is characterized by traditional villages, historical sites, and a slower pace of life, offering a more rural feel compared to other parts of Malta.

Name: Valletta
Description: Valletta is the capital city of Malta, known for its rich history, cultural landmarks, and UNESCO World Heritage Sites. It is a hub for both tourism and government.

Name: Gozo
Description: Gozo is the second-largest island of Malta, known for its peaceful atmosphere, scenic landscapes, ancient temples, and beautiful coastline.

Name: Central Region
Description: The Central Region of Malta includes bustling towns and neighborhoods with a mix of urban and residential areas, and is home to many schools and business districts.
